message:
Runaways and homeless youths have a much greater risk for being trafficked due to their vulnerabilities. Hopefully, when they charged Mr. Atkins with human trafficking they dropped the arrest charge on the minor. People who are trafficked are victims, not offenders and should be treated as such. 
"A Little Rock man arrested last week on a charge of human trafficking of a minor told a homeless 17-year-old he would give her a place to live only if she would "work" for him, police said." https://buff.ly/2uDv7Xx
